name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.retries
description: Number of retries to use when finding the next block during HDFS writes.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.skiplist.interval
description:
The interval after which the skip levels will be formed in the skip list
    for storing directory snapshot diffs. By default, value is set to 10.

name: dfs.client.short.circuit.num
description:
Number of short-circuit caches. This setting should
    be in the range 1 - 5. Lower values will result in lower CPU consumption; higher
    values may speed up massive parallel reading files.

name: fs.s3a.connection.maximum
description:
Controls the maximum number of simultaneous connections to S3.
    This must be bigger than the value of fs.s3a.threads.max so as to stop
    threads being blocked waiting for new HTTPS connections.
    Why not equal? The AWS SDK transfer manager also uses these connections.

name: dfs.qjournal.finalize-segment.timeout.ms
description:
Quorum timeout in milliseconds during finalizing for a specific
    segment.

name: ha.failover-controller.new-active.rpc-timeout.ms
description: Timeout that the FC waits for the new active to become active

name: ipc.[port_number].weighted-cost.response
description:
The weight multiplier to apply to the time spent in the
    RESPONSE phase which do not involve holding a lock.
    See org.apache.hadoop.ipc.ProcessingDetails.Timing for more details on
    this phase. This property applies to WeightedTimeCostProvider.

name: mapreduce.task.merge.progress.records
description:
The number of records to process during merge before
   sending a progress notification to the MR ApplicationMaster.
